name: 2-Handed Sword
effect:
Weapon • Shield
"They shall pay," Gahid said bitterly, "for the destruction of a Deverenian city. No dwarf shall escape us. Let the mountain rats crawl back beneath their rocks, else they shall die skewered upon our blades.

name: Aenne the Tempest
effect:
Deverenian• Skyborne Path
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.
"She has been touched by the fury of the Storm... but her heart is too weak to hold the truth." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Animate Skeleton
effect:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Put this card in your first rank as a level 1 Undead fighter with ATK +5, AC 14, and 2 hit points. The Skeleton is killed at the end of the turn.
Oh, Narawi, sweet Narawi... such lovely savages. Darling, return, and join us; your men are waiting. You, and I, as it should be, forever... " - Absinthe

name: Anthril Hammer
effect:
Weapon
This character may not ready during the Ready Phase if the Hammer is spent.
React: Spend the hammer before this fighter makes a melee strike roll to add +6 to the die roll.
Anthril, the metal spun into Ironcloth. It's as heavy as the heart of the earth, but stronger than faith.

name: Archer Team
effect:
Nothrog • Savrukk's Legion
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Spend another Archer Team in this rank to perform a +7 ranged strike.
"You don't see much of Savrukk's soldiers. Just an arrow, and a rustle in the woods." - Rren'the

name: Aurora Flame
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character of equal or lower level up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or become stunned.
The northern lights can be seen from the mountains of Toris Kelt, shining like the eyes of the gods in the blackness of the void.

name: Avenger
effect:
Weapon • Unique • May only be equipped by a good Paladin.
React: Roll a die after this character is targeted with a spell. If the roll is even, the spell is canceled.
Forged into its blade is this simple phrase: "The innocent shall be avenged!"

name: Ball Lightning
effect:
Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer one wound.
"Don't let the Deverenians tell you they invented sorcery. It was around long before the Empire, and destroyed more nations than even the oldest histories tell." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Bands of Force
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or this card is attached to him or her. A character with Bands of Force attached must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) before initiative each turn or suffer one wound.
"Alaric, Maul has forsaken us. Why seek him?"

name: Baron Voghul
effect:
Deverenian • Archon
You must have Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant in your army to bring Voghul into play. Voghul may not start the game in play.
Gifted by the storm, borne on verdatha wings: I am law, I am justice, I am strength.

name: Battle Plans
effect:
Spend Order: If this fighter succeeds with a perception skill test (DC 12), you may move any number of characters in your army forward or backward one rank, in any order you choose.
"The world's a big place, Timmy. But it's getting smaller every day." - Jack Casey

name: Bear Form
effect:
Lycanthrope Form • May only be equipped by a Lycanthrope. When this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
"Once the Master has given his blessing, you can never reject it. His scar will be with you forever." - Toren Yscar

name: Between the Ribs
effect:
React: Play after this rogue fails a melee strike roll. You may reroll the strike.
"Our trade is death, Hassimal, not gold. See that the King of Toheuth remembers that. Begin with his brother." - Black Tom

name: Black Sun Shield
effect:
Shield • Unique
May only be equipped by an evil paladin.
+5 Skill.
"I will tear down your truths and show you the darkness behind the sun. And when you armies are crushed beneath my heel, Aroch will be no more than a handful of dust."-Rhawn d'Ilchant

name: Blessed Water
effect:
Order: Discard the Blessed Water to perform a +7 ranged strike that may only target an Undead character. This strike inflicts an additional wound, if it hits.
"I've killed you once. I'll kill you again." - Xiat

name: Bracers of Archery
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Ranged strike rolls made by this character add +4 to the die roll. If this character rolls a natural 20 for a ranged strike roll, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"An arrow does not hear your screams. It does not turn aside for pity or for gold. Do not waste the breath - it will be your last." - Gueniveure

name: Cardinal Scelus
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
Order: Once per turn, move a Deverenian character forward or backward one rank.
The Storm, that Lion within the Sky, bids us open our arms and welcome its righteous strength, And so say I: gather what thou needest, mage. The Church will be with thee in thy quest.

name: Catching Arrows
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Play after this character or an adjacent character is targeted with a ranged strike. The target gains +5 AC for the strike.
"And you said it couldn't be done." - Kun Hall

name: Chinua Ukwa
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Narawat
Chinua cannot become ready if he is in the same rank as an evil character.
The darkness... is almost too much to bear.

name: Clerics' Guild
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this cleric. While it's attached, the cleric gains +3 AC and +3 Skill.
... bringing the divine to the world, and seeking clarity in a moment's revelation...

name: Cloak of Many Things
effect:
Order: Discard the Cloak. This character may retrieve from your discard pile an item he or she can legally equip, and immediately equip the item.
"What? I don't remember putting that in there. Hey, hang on... what's this?" - Basil Nemis

name: Conversion
effect:
Paladin only.
Order: Target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target is the same alignment as this Paladin.
"Forget your past, Kerebrus. It is time to plan a better future." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Crush
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll to add +5 to the die roll. If the strike hits, you may immediately select and discard one item equipped by the target (before wounds are inflicted).
"It was in the way." - Phar'dunn

name: Curse of Rage
effect:
Evil characters only.
Order: Add +5 to all players' melee strike rolls and ranged strike rolls until the end of turn.
Every heart holds some cruelty within it. Tap the source, and you will release the flood. - Cardinal Scelus

name: Cymaniel
effect:
Elf • Ranger • Glyn
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
If Whispershot wishes my hand, then he will need a voice, not a bow. An arrow cannot make me his.

name: Daanso Batoq
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Undead
Wraith • May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character in an adjacent rank. The character suffers one wound and permanently loses a level. If the target is level zero, he or she is killed.
" My cousin. My friend. My failure." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Darkness
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
React: After Darkness kills a higher level character with a melee strike, draw a card.
Your father is just a man, Alaric, which is why he needs my father and me all the more...

name: Davon Ironthorn
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
"Toris Kelt may be our beacon of hope, Sir Robert," the ranger said. "But there's still an army of elves between it and us."

name: Death Rune
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard attaches this card to a Weapon in your army that does not have a Death Rune. While the rune is attached, the weapon inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
"Kill sound, kill breath, kill light, bring death." - Chant of Silverflame

name: Decay
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets an item up to two ranks away. The target item is discarded.
"No sword is stronger than the hand that wields it." - Xiat

name: Defensive Posture
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, this character has +3 AC but must subtract 2 from all melee strike rolls.
"You saved my life... " he whispered, cradling the injured cleric in his arms. "Who are you?"

name: Degais
effect:
Deverenian • Seer • Myerdeth
After Degais enters play from your hand, reveal the top card from your deck - if it is a character, you may put it into play immediately. If it is not a character or if you cannot legally put the character into play, put the card on the bottom of your deck.
Fear has many eyes.

name: Demonic Possession
effect:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away that is not a good cleric or good Paladin, nor adjacent to one. If the target fails a magic save (DC 13), he or she immediately performs melee strikes against a character of your choice adjacent to the target.
"I told Jigoral it was too dangerous... " - Raubin

name: Deslarion
effect:
Elf • Apprentice
Deslarion gains +4 ATK when performing a melee strike against a good character.
"Daedalia's apprentice is not as skilled with a knife as his Mistress. Sometimes his victims stop screaming to draw breath." - Rathe

name: Disarm
effect:
Order: If this fighter is in the 1st rank, target an item in another player's first rank. If this fighter succeeds with a skill check (DC 8 + target character's skill), the item is discarded.
"Children shouldn't play with sharp toys." - Maddawc

name: Distrust
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character of equal or lower level who is of the opposite alignment to their Warlord. The target is killed.
"Begone, Damien, and let they dogs feed upon thy savagery. I'truth, thou art no more fit than they to be called 'man.'" - Duchess Brymin

name: Divine Anguish
effect:
Order: This cleric targets an opposing character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or move back one rank.
"No mortal eyes can withstand the light of true faith." - Behlial

name: Divine Right
effect:
Paladin only.
React: Play after a character of the opposite alignment to this paladin makes a magic save roll. The die is rerolled.
"... and my Neus forgive your sins, my son." - Frederik Lahr

name: Donovan Che'har
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian • Misearis • Uthanak's Legion
"Some humans choose to work with the Nothrog - for gold, and for the power. Damn all those who care for money more than pride." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Doppleganger
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
React: After the Doppleganger kills an opposing character with a melee strike, the Doppleganger may permanently copy one of the following from that character (replacing the Doppleganger's stats): Class, Level, base ATKs, AC, hit points, skill.
Do you trust your brother, Rhawn?

name: Dragon Plate
effect:
Armor • Unique • May only be equipped by a good Paladin.
+1 hit point.
"If a man has not discovered something he is willing to die for, then he is not fit to live." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Dragon's Breath
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • Krun's Legion
May not attack.
Spend Order: Target one or two characters that are up to two ranks away and adjacent to each other. Select the order of attack, then perform a +3 ranged strike against each target. "Let them feast on fire." - Sethusk

name: Earth's Fury
effect:
Gargoyle only.
Order: This cleric targets an adjacent rank. All ready characters in that rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Rockhome, born of dream. The Abyss, born of nightmare. It is time for both to awaken...

name: Earthquake
effect:
Spend Order: You must discard a card from your hand to cast this spell. All 1st level characters in rank 1 become stunned. Ready 1st level characters in rank 2 and ready 2nd level characters in rank 1 become spent.
"The earth tore asunder' from the depths crawled horrific creatures. An these dwarves rise from the same abyss, we must then forfeit our lives to eradicate them entire." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Edge
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Edge gains +5 ATK when performing a melee strike against an evil character.
I ha' seen the sky turn red as blood. How can ye who live beneath it forget yer past when it is painted o'such a canvas?

name: Edouard
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Apprentice
Half-Nothrog
"I found him on the road, a babe abandoned by his legion because of his blood. I raised the boy as my apprentice. He is like a son to me now. A simple-minded, arrogant wretch of a son, but a son nonetheless." - Gaston, Chatelain of Arak Spire.

name: Elegy
effect:
Dwarf • Bard
Whenever Elegy makes a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character who has killed a dwarf this turn, add +5 to the die roll.
She sings them their last song in this world... and their first in the next.

name: Elemere
effect:
Elf • Druid • Glyn
After this character is killed, draw a card.
"The depths of Myreth hold graveyards filled with the bones of creatures whose names even we do not remember"

name: Elephant Form
effect:
Lycanthrope Form • May only be equipped by a Lycanthrope. When this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
+2 hit points.
"The cult of Yscar has been hidden for decades... why return, only to be destroyed?" - Kenia

name: Ellyah
effect:
Elf • Dythanus • Priest of Bone
Spend Order: Target an opposing character up to two ranks away and a character in your army. Until the end of turn, the opposing character suffers -4 AC and the character in your army gains +4 AC.
We of Dythanus serve an eternal cause and an eternal master.

name: Ellyah's Children
effect:
Evil characters only.
Order: When in the 1st rank, spend Ellyah's Children to have them attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +1.
"Ellyah calls them her 'children', and mourns if they are destroyed. She does not weep when first their lives are taken - her tears are for the dead, but not the living." - Yanthorine

name: Eye of Morghen
effect:
Unique • You may only play this card if you have a 5th level or higher Lich in your army.
Order: Spend the Eye to target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + this characters skill) or be stunned.

name: Eyestalk of Confusion
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
Order: Spend this eyestalk to target a ready character of lower level. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become spent.
"Seventh... monkey... mudpie... butler... you're welcome... "

name: Eyestalk of Disintegration
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to perform a +5 ranged strike. Armor and Helms do not add to the targets AC for this strike.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target an item card up to 2 ranks away. The target's character must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or discard the item.

name: Eyestalk of Fear
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
React: Spend the Eyestalk before a melee strike roll targeting this character. The attacking character must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or the strike automatically fails.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target an opposing character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or move back one rank.

name: Eyestalk of Sleep
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.
Sleep is but a little walk from death.

name: Eyestalk of Sloth
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target a character with more than one melee strike per attack. Until the end of the turn, the target loses his or her last strike per attack.
The battalion of dwarves that rose beneath the grounds of Sharn Keep did not live to tell the tale.

name: Eyestalk of Stoneflesh
effect:
+1 AC
Reaver Only.
Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer two wounds.
"The creature gazed upon me, and my hand began to change. I know not what magic was used, but I fled with my life - and a token, to remind me of my folly." - Lord Anguisant of Sharn

name: Fighters' Guild
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this fighter. While it's attached, the fighter gains +2 ATK and +2 AC.
... or shattering shield and splintering blow, weaving swordplay into song...

name: Fireball
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. After the ranged strike, the character(s) adjacent to the target must succeed with a magic save (DC 9) or suffer one wound.
"It's beautiful... " - Muddflek

name: Forget
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. Until the end of the turn, the target cannot perform actions printed on his or her card, or on equipped items.
"Who am I?"

name: Full Defense
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter receives a bonus to his or her AC equal to his or her ATK (use the first ATK if there is more than one).
"Hold the line! For the sake of your wives and your children, lads, hold the line just a few more minutes!" - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Fumble
effect:
React: Play after a character rolls a natural 1 on a strike or save roll. The character suffers one wound.
"Oops." - Johan the Burglar

name: Fury
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character of opposite alignment. Add +4 to the die roll. If this fighter is a Barbarian, add an additional +2 (+6 total) to the die roll.
"Ersane still lives, and I shall find her. She will not be allowed to forget her oath to me so easily." - Sir Magnus Arcadis

name: Gas Grenade
effect:
Spend Order: Target a rank up to two ranks away from this rogue. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -2 AC while in that rank.
"Finish her." - L'sara

name: Gaston Bonhomme
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Summoner
Chatelain of Arak Spire
Spend Order: Target a character in play. That character is +1 level until end of the turn.
"Don't mind father. He's like that with everyone." - Edouard

name: Golden Dragon Shield
effect:
Shield • Unique • May only be equipped by a good Paladin.
Order: If this character is in the 1st rank, spend the Shield to perform a melee strike with a base ATK of +3. This strike gains no ATK bonuses from Weapon items.
"Never discount a good shield. It can protect you from your own mistakes." - Sir Wallence

name: Griffon of Misear
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend the Griffon to move forward one rank.
React: Spend the Griffon instead of spending or stunning this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.
"They were once noble companions. Now they are dying... along with my country's honor." - Keziah

name: Grimjack
effect:
Mercenary • Toheuth
Characters adjacent to Grimjack have -3 AC.
"Toheuth is south of most human lands, near the mashes of Markappal. Some say they prefer the alligators in the swamp to their own kind. " - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Grukth
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger • Forward Observer
Characters in the rank behind Grukth add +2 to their ranged strike rolls.
"Just tell me where to point the bow." - Maakh

name: Hand of Morghen
effect:
Unique • You may only play this card if you have a 4th level or higher Lich in your army.
Order: Spend the Hand to target a character in an adjacent rank. The target suffers a -2 ATK, AC or skill (your choice) until the end of the turn. This character gains +2 to the same stat.
Morghen sacrificed his hand to save his father, but in vain. It was returned with his father's skull...

name: Helix
effect:
Steed • Unique • May only be equipped by a Terak Justicebringer. Terak's first melee strike each turn inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
Order: Spend Helix to move forward or backward one rank.
"Once more, brave friend, into the skies that gave you birth." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Hope
effect:
Dwarf
When hope enters play, you may shuffle one cleric action card of level 3 or less from your discard pile back into your deck.
I believe that in every heart there is some bright spark of good. Even in yours, my friend.

name: Hurled Dagger
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"One down, ten thousand to go." - Darian Windson

name: Imprisoned
effect:
Order: Target a non-Warlord character in an opposing 1st rank with no items equipped. If the character is 3rd level or higher, put the character into his or her owner's hand.
"Being born noble does not mean that people will follow you. You must earn their trust." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Inspiration
effect:
Bard only.
Order: Until the end of turn, all characters (including the bard) add +3 to their die rolls while in the same rank as this bard.
"Follow me, and I will lead you to glory!" - Keziah

name: Ironcloth Bracer
effect:
Shield
React: Spend the Ironcloth Bracer before a ranged strike roll targeting this character. The ranged strike automatically fails.
"What we've taken from the dwarves that have fallen is most impressive. If only we could manufacture this material ourselves." - Cordeos

name: Jad'harak
effect:
Nothrog • Shaman • Vision Speaker
Spend React: After you perform an order, Jad'harak performs a skill check (DC 13). If successful, a character in this rank may immediately perform another order.
"Never regret. Regret kills dreams."

name: Jamr ibn Al-as
effect:
Free Kingdoms •Havat-lahn Narawat
Jamr can use action cards of all classes.
A Havat-lahn spends his life preparing to be judged by the Nine Gods. When he dies, he must prove his worth. Perfection is rewarded with ascendance. Failure - the ultimate arrogance - is rewarded with an eternity of pain.

name: Jarad Kirpatrick
effect:
Free Kingdoms
"Andover burns, mother. I cannot stay to grieve for you. This great nation needs my prayers to lighten its burden, and I cannot pray when my voice is choked with tears."

name: Killing Blow
effect:
React: Play after another character in your army kills a character with a melee strike, ranged strike, or action. This character is considered to have killed the character instead.
"Not bad, Andover," Jamr said. "But I had to finish the job. I don't know your ways, but in Narawi - we don't take prisoners."

name: Kun Hull
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Myrmidon
React: After Kun hits a character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted, that character must discard an item card (opponent's choice) in addition to suffering a wound.
Seeing the Way is not difficult. You simply close your eyes.

name: Lava Burst
effect:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"Find allies, Gnorrow, and do not fear for us. If you can find them, we will be saved. If not, then do not return. There will be nothing left to come home for." - King Xod

name: Layamon
effect:
Deverenian • Hunchback
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"My body is twisted by birth, but my soul is strong. Mock my hobbled gait, sir knight, and soon you will walk not at all."

name: Lazarus Saul
effect:
Mercenary • Assassin • Nightwalker
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike targeting a spent character one rank away.
"The Prince of Toris Kelt yet lives? See to it, Saul - and triple the rate." - Black Tom

name: Leave It To Me
effect:
Spend Order: Target a ready character in your army up to two ranks away. Spend the target character and switch the positions of this character and the target.
"Do not fear for Cassandra, Robert. I will guard your Lady with my life and my blood while you are away. As I always have." - Maxmilian

name: Life Drain
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target is -1 level until the end of the turn. If the target is level zero, he or she is killed.
"The soul is the source of pain. Anyone who has ever loved can tell you that." - Tepheroth

name: Lightning Bolt
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"Blissful pain, hear me now. Bring my enemies all that they deserve." - Tepheroth

name: Lord Anguisant
effect:
Deverenian • Scout
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike while spent.
"Once he was Lord of Sharn, but now he is lord only of torn rocks and salted earth. The Nothrog have taken his city - them and their dreadful Master." - Baudwyn Troubadour

name: Lunassa
effect:
Familiar
This wizard can use action cards as if he or she were a 1st level rogue.
"Walk with me, dear one. We have work to do... and a little time before the dawn." - Aenne

name: Magma Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • You must have Sjonegaard in your army to bring Magma Gargoyle into play.
React: After Magma Gargoyle hits a character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted, select and discard one item equipped by that character.
"The blood of the earth, given form." - Claw

name: Main Gauche
effect:
Shield • Fighter or rogue only. 
"Tepheroth pardoned Sedwin of his crime so that he could hunt Rowan for her. Elf does not kill elf - but Sedwin had already spilled his own cousin's blood. What matter, then, if he should kill more? A mercy for him, that his death will be quick - and for Tepheroth, an assassin she can control." - Artheon

name: Memory's Flame
effect:
Order: Target another player. That player must select and discard a card from his or her hand.
"A wizard's mind is the source of his power. Burn away the memories, and you burn away the man." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
effect: Order: Attach this card to this wizard. While it is attached, 1st and 2nd level characters cannot target this wizard with melee strikes, ranged strikes, or spells. Discard this card when this wizard performs an action or the turn ends.

name: Morghen Dythanus
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique • Lich
Necromancer • Undead • Dythanus
Other elf wizards in this rank are +1 level for casting spells.
Turn from the temporal. Embrace the eternal.

name: Muddflek
effect:
Nothrog • Scout
Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. Muddflek is killed after the strike resolves.
Heh, heh... heh, heh... heh, heh... BOOM.

name: Mystic Fog
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have +3 AC against ranged strikes. If this character is a Druid, all characters have +6 AC instead.
"Lahr!" Logan shouted. "Hide them! The Nothrog ride, and seek innocent blood!"

name: Nehil
effect:
Familiar
+2 Skill.
React: After this wizard spends to cast a 1st or 2nd level spell, spend Nehil to ready the wizard.
"Two Deverenians approached on a moonless night - but Sali had already seen them, and was far, far away." - Timothy Windson

name: No Rest
effect:
Necromancer only.
Spend React: After an opposing character is killed, this wizard targets the character and makes a skill check (DC of target's level x 5). If successful, the character joins your army and gains the Undead trait. Discard all equipped cards, remove all wounds, and put him in your 1st rank, spent. Return the character to his owner's discard when the game ends or the character leaves play.

name: Noenare
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
React: After Noenare enters play, shuffle one character card of lower level from your discard pile back into your deck.
She keeps the key to the tombs of those who sleep, and guards it with her life.

name: Nokhtkruger
effect:
Steed • Unique• Verdatha • May only be equipped by an evil Paladin.
Order: Spend Nokhtkruger to give this character +5 to all melee strike rolls until the end of the turn.
Order: Spend Nokhtkruger to move forward or backward one rank.
"Verdatha. Storm Demons. Ask me no more." - Balian

name: Out of the Shadows
effect:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, select another character in this rank who becomes the new target. If this rogue is an Assassin and the attacker is in an adjacent rank, this rogue performs a melee strike targeting the attacker immediately after the original strike resolves.
"Not this time. Not ever." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Overrun
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the fighter has a Steed equipped, the strike inflicts an additional wound, if it hits.
"There is one advantage we have against the elves," Robert said thoughtfully. "Speed."
"But how can speed help us?" Dunbar asked.
Robert grinned. "Watch and see."

name: Phon
effect:
Elf • Bard • Syneri • Tuneweaver
Other elves in the same rank as Phon add +2 to all their die rolls.
The end of song is silence. The end of life need not be.

name: Pike
effect:
Weapon
This character gains +3 ATK when performing a melee strike roll against a character with a Steed equipped.
Spend Order: If this character is in the 1st rank, target a character in another player's 2nd rank with a melee strike.
"Hold, set... steady, now!"

name: Point Blank Shot
effect:
Fighter or Rogue only.
React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The strike may target a character in an adjacent rank. If this character is a Scout or Ranger, draw a card.
"Going somewhere?" Cymaniel smiled sweetly.

name: Poisoned Blood
effect:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or this card is attached to him or her. A character with Poisoned Blood attached must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) before initiative rolls each turn or suffer one wound.

name: Protection from Evil
effect:
Spend React: Play before an evil character makes a melee strike roll. The strike automatically fails.
"The labor of righteous hearts is to seek the good within each creature and shield it from harm. If we can do that, then we can save the world. One soul at a time." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Protection from Good
effect:
Spend React: Play before a good character makes a melee strike roll. The strike automatically fails.
"Ask not why good fails; why does evil prevail? In every heart there is some touch of evil, some darkness that shall always seek its source." - Slovien

name: Protection from Missiles
effect:
Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain +6 AC against ranged strikes while in that rank.
"I do not know why she saved me. Perhaps she sensed that there was still good within my heart, or perhaps the elves were her enemies. I only know that I live, and owe her more than I can say." - Maakh

name: Qaiya Mennanakh
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Rathe
React: Once per strike, before Qaiya makes a melee strike roll, randomly rearrange the characters in the target's rank.
She follows her father into war, riding the steed of her noble birth.

name: Rain of Shards
effect:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Target an adjacent rank. This cleric performs a melee strike with an ATK of +2 against each character in that rank. The ATK of these strikes cannot be modified.
"They will fail because they have a finite number of warriors. I have an infinite number of stones." - Sjonegaard, Lord of the Earth

name: Raubin
effect:
Elf • Runaway
React: Once per turn, after Raubin kills a character with a melee strike, she may perform an additional melee strike.
I loathe Sedwin. One day I'll see him speared at the end of his own blade - but at least I'll have the courage to accept punishment for a crime that saves our people.

name: Revenge
effect:
Dwarf
Revenge inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits a Monster with a melee strike.
"His family died when Goldenaxe fell to the Abyss, but he refused to yield. Only vengeance has kept him alive this far... vengeance and destiny." - Faith

name: Ring of Air
effect:
React: Spend the Ring of Air before a ranged strike roll targeting a character in this rank. The ranged strike automatically fails.
"There's nothing enlightened about it." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Ritual of Eternal Darkness
effect:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This wizard targets another character in this rank. The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 10) or suffer 3 wounds. If the target succeeds, he or she permanently gains +1 hit point, +3 AC and the Undead trait.
"A moment of pain... an eternity everafter."

name: Roc Form
effect:
Lycanthrope Form • May only be equipped by a Lycanthrope. When this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
Order: Up to twice per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Rock Crawlers
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Rock Crawlers or bring one into play.
"As his sons are to Xod, so are the stones to me." - Sjonegaard

name: Rod of Wonder
effect:
Order: Spend the Rod to roll a die.
1-3: Nearby grass grows quickly (no effect).
4-7: Stun a character up to two ranks away.
8-12: Perform a +8 ranged strike.
13-19: +4 ATK, +5 AC until end of the turn.
20: A target character up to three ranks away must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer two wounds.

name: Rogues' Guild
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this rogue. While it's attached, the rogue gains +1 ATK, +2 AC, and +3 skill.
We all walk in whispers through this life, whether through shadow and craft, theft and guile...

name: Rrek'tor
effect:
Nothrog • Quarrymaster
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"Storm, lightning, and thunder... look out!" - Sir Delevere

name: Rune of Swift Striking
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard attaches this card to a Weapon in your army that does not have a Rune of Swift Striking. While this rune is attached, the weapon provides an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +0 whenever its character attacks.
"Take that, Myerdeth scum! And that! And that!" - Johan Halfblood

name: Sabith Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
"Another of the Yscar clan. This one has been cursed to wear the scars of his transgressions." - Tanner Trollson

name: Sakarian Giant
effect:
Mercenary
Sakarian Giant inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
"Given the choice between fighting them or the Nothrog... I'd run." - Basil Nemis

name: Scales of the Storm
effect:
Armor • Unique• May only be equipped by an evil Paladin.
This character may not be targeted with ranged strikes.
World without end, and without beginning. All shall be as one in the Dragon's Eye.

name: Scouting the Target
effect:
Spend React: Play before another character makes a ranged strike roll. Add +3 to the die roll. If this character is a Scout, add an additional +3 (+6 total) to the die roll.
"Orochoff finds dwarves scuttling to the surface, and he sets traps for them. Like roaches in caves, soon enough, they die." - Taoth

name: Shade Lion
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Shade Lion to move forward or backward one rank
React: Spend Shade Lion instead of spending or stunning this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.
"The Nothrog use them as steeds, howling through the night like spectres, blood upon their fangs."

name: Shambling Mound
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items. The Mound has +5 AC versus ranged strikes.
Order: Once per turn, target a character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 14) or suffer -4 AC until the end of the turn.
"The little ones are so... pretty." - Brindle

name: Shield
effect:
Dwarf
Shield has -3 AC while spent. I still hold hope that we will find what we seek. These Deverenians are evil, but they cannot be all that remain of those we left behind so long ago.

name: Sir Magnus Arcadis
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
Order of the Storm • Aedroud
Magnus can cast spells as if he were a 1st level cleric. All other Deverenian fighters and rogues in this rank are +1 level for using action cards.
If I die, and the Storm takes my life in the Emperor's name, then let them say only this of me: I have kept the faith.

name: Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Unique • Paladin
Rellion • Knight of the Black Sun
Rhawn can cast spells as if he were a 2nd level cleric. While Rhawn is in the 1st rank, characters in the other players' 1st ranks must succeed with a fear save (DC 9) to ready.
Put the sun to rest; seek light no more.

name: Sjonegaard
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique • Gargoyle
Sjonegaard may not equip Armor, Shield, or Helm items. When searching your deck for a card, you may not remove Sjonegaard from your deck. Other Gargoyles in your army gain +2 ATK.
You cannot destroy the earth. Hurl blows upon it, cast your spells - we will endure.

name: Skull of Dythanus
effect:
Unique • You may only play this card if you have a 4th level or higher Lich in your army.
This character is +1 level.
"My father was the first necromancer, and the source of our freedom. Damn Syneri, and damn his perfect blade... " - Morghen Dythanus

name: Slave Labor
effect:
Nothrog • Baraxton Slaves
"Keep that pretty one alive, Rrek'tor. She's worth twice as much to me, and I'll crush your hands if you break her. Scar her up a bit, though. Make her useful." - Varg

name: Sleight of Hand
effect:
Order: Target an item on this character and equip it to another character in this rank that may legally equip it.
Order: Target an item in this rank that this character may legally equip. This character equips the item.
"Senator Palis, there is a man here to see you."

name: Soul Chamber
effect:
Unique • You may only play this card if you have Morghen Dythanus in your army.
React: After Morghen suffers a wound that will kill him, and if the Soul Chamber is equipped by a different character, negate the wound and move Morghen to the rank behind your current last rank.

name: Speed of the Gods
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in play. Until the end of the turn, that character has an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +0 whenever he or she attacks.
"Go Urg, to the battlefield. Bring me blood, steel, and pain, and when you return, we shall forge a sword fit for your father's soul." - Takh

name: Spider Form
effect:
Lycanthrope Form • May only be equipped by a Lycanthrope. When this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
This character has an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +2 (+5 with the Spider Form's ATK bonus) whenever he or she attacks.

name: Spiritreaver
effect:
Unique • Familiar • You may only play this card if you have a 5th level or higher Lich in your army. +6 Skill.
The black bird feeds upon the souls it scavenges, leaving the dead flesh for its master's works.

name: Squire Lucian
effect:
Familiar •Unique • May only be equipped by a good Paladin.
This paladin has an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +3 whenever he or she attacks.
"Do your duty, and leave the rest to the gods."

name: Stealing from the Dead
effect:
React: Play after this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike. Target an item equipped by the killed character. Search your deck for an item of equal or lower level that this rogue may immediately equip, and equip the item.
"It's just easier this way." - Devon Harper

name: Storm's Caress
effect:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters entering play in ranks 1 and 2 are spent.
"The Emperor will succeed in his quest... after a fashion." - Toren Yscar

name: Stormbrand
effect:
Weapon • Unique •May only be equipped by an evil paladin.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a melee strike, perform a skill check (DC 20 minus the opposing character's level). If successful, this character gains 1 hit point permanently.
Ablung's last blade... his death, sheathed in steel.

name: Studded Leather
effect:
Armor
-3 skill.
"Forever, gentle Alia of Rowan. You have given me life. Your blood now runs through the veins of us both," Rathe whispered in her mind, "and by the strength of your heart, we shall find life eternal."

name: Summon Ally
effect:
Summoners play this without spending.
Spend React: Play before you put a character into play in your army. Reduce the character's entering rank by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
"In war, you must choose your allies by the enemies they keep." - Zoe

name: Summon Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf only.
Order: Search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.
The art of creation is far older than the art of war.

name: Take Advantage
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting a stunned character. The strike is automatically successful and inflicts an additional wound.
"Before he could rise, the Nothrog struck him from behind. My father's life, taken by a coward's blow." - Serah ni Fionn

name: Terak Justicebringer
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Unique • Paladin
Terak can cast spells as if he were a 2nd level cleric. Other good characters gain +2 AC while in the same rank as Terak. Good characters gain +3 ATK while adjacent to Terak.
He is the last Paladin of Aroch. He will not waver. He will not turn. When his last breath takes his soul to eternity, only then will he cease to believe.

name: Terror of Sharn Keep
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique • Reaver
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After the Terror suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.
Pain. Sorrow. Fear.

name: The Gauntlet
effect:
Spend Order: If this fighter is in your 1st rank, target a character in an opposing armies 1st rank. The fighter performs a number of consecutive melee strikes against characters in the target's rank equal to the difference between the number of characters in that army's 1st and 2nd ranks.
"Life is full of hard knocks. Get used to it." - Jack Casey

name: The Quest Beast
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Immediately after it attacks, the Quest Beast moves to the rank behind your last occupied rank.
"Seventy and nine knights have sought for it, begging the power it is said to command. Only one man knows its name." - Magnus

name: Trample
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the fighter has a Steed equipped, he or she gains +4 ATK for this strike, and may reroll the die.
"Humans are fit for one thing only: to cushion the ground beneath the hooves of my steed!" - Varg

name: Uthival Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Tremayne
Deverenians in your army are +1 level for equipping Armor, Shield, and Helm items.
"The court may hate my cousin, but they still have need of my swords. Our house is safe, Elaneor. For now."

name: Vehdred
effect:
Elf
React: After Vehdred kills an opposing character with a melee strike, remove a wound from Vehdred.
"The raven is hoarse, its voice stolen by the night. It cannot cry her passage, cannot warn you of the danger that walks within your halls... " - Absinthe

name: Vengeance
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll or a ranged strike roll targeting a character of opposite alignment. Add +10 to the die roll. If this fighter is a Paladin, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"The earth knows naught of hate nor love, peace nor war, but vengeance? Aye, it knows vengeance." - Avalanche

name: Walk on Wind
effect:
Order: This wizard targets another character in this rank. Move the character forward or backward one rank. If this wizard is a Shaman, he or she may then move forward or backward one rank.
"His eyes bleed, and he claims the Storm calls to him. Master, I tell thee, Euain is wholly unwell." - Theoloc

name: Wall of Stone
effect:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Target this cleric's rank. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain +8 AC while in this rank.
"At Hember's request, I placed a wall around Rockhome. I swore that it would stand until the Abyss had been defeated, and I will keep that promise." - Sjonegaard the Elemental

name: Wizard Barakiel
effect:
Familiar • Unique
This wizard is evil while Barakiel is equipped. +3 Skill. Spells cast by this wizard have +5 DC. Ranged strikes by this wizard add +5 to their die rolls.
Tepheroth's shadow moves and breathes, a living thing among the dead.

name: Wizards' Guild
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this wizard. While it's attached, the wizard gains +4 skill and all spells cast by this wizard have a +3 DC.
... or seeking knowledge and power through sorcery's might. The trick is not to walk alone.

name: Wolf Form
effect: Lycanthrope Form• May only be equipped by a Lycanthrope. When this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms. "Help me," he pleaded, showing the silvery scar upon his arm. "They have taken my soul... "

name: Word of Recall
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a non-Warlord character in your army. Put the character into your hand. All effects (including wounds) currently affecting the character end. If this cleric is a Seer, put all of your items equipped by the character into your hand; otherwise, they are discarded.
"And then I go home again. Just like in the deal."

name: Yscar the Elder
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Unique • Lycanthrope
Order: Once per turn, get a Lycanthrope Form from your deck, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.
Order: Once per turn, discard a Lycanthrope Form equipped by Yscar.
"Do not believe Elven lies. The future is as malleable as our flesh... "
